markdownRemark.html: No, I haven’t moved physically. Rather, I’ve moved my blog. My first blog, coffee. code. cedric, was hosted on Medium when that was the cool thing to do. I even had a custom domain for my publication before that [feature was steamrolled] (https://help.medium.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003053487-Custom-Domains-service-deprecation).
